title: Saint Croix Island International Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons          Visitor Center Hours May 21 - June: 9 am to 4:30 pm, closed Tuesday and Wednesdays July - October 10: 9 am to 4:30 pm, daily         When is the park open? The park is open year-round during daylight hours. During the winter, services are limited. The displays and bronze statutes along the interpretive trail are covered to prevent damage from inclement weather, and the visitor center is closed. The entrance gate opens mid-April.          When are park rangers available for questions and programs? Mid-May - Columbus Day: A bilingual (French-English) park ranger is available most days. After Columbus Day - October: A park ranger or volunteer may be available. November - mid-May: On-site staff at the visitor center are not regularly scheduled.
